content: * to last 3 sts k3 backward loop cast on 6 sts remove sm kfab knit to 1 st before sm kfab remove sm row 3-8 repeat row 1 and 2 place next 28 sts on waste yarn backward loop cast on 6 sts remove sm kfab knit to end of row yoke switch to larger size needles stitch count 92 set-up row ws with mc purl row adding stitch markers work straight until body measures 5¾ /14 5cm from the as indicated by / 7/6/18/6/7 underarm finishing with a ws row row 1 increase and short row rs *knit to 1 st before knit 1 row with cc sm kfab slipm kfab repeat from * 3 more times for each sm k1 turn sl1 and pull yarn over and around needle tightening slipped st and creating a double st 8 sts increase = 52 www tikkiknits com au pattern is for personal use only 4 | george ribbing sleeves switch to smaller size needles place one set of held stitches on your choice of larger size needles for small circumference knitting row 1 ws p1 *p2 k2 repeat from * to last 3 sts p3 join yarn and pick up and knit 10 sts from the underarm cast row 2 rs k1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to last 3 sts k3 on edge 38 sts row 3-7 repeat row 1 and 2 twice more then row 1 knit round to the last original sleeve stitch ssk worked over once more the last of the sleeve sts and the first of the picked up sts using larger size needles cast-off in pattern leave last st k4 place sm to indicate sor k4 k2tog knit to end of round live 36 sts rounds 1-6 knit button band pick up 53 sts evenly along the rh edge 54 sts - or multiple round 7 knit to last 6 sts ssk k4 of 4 +2 round 8 k4 k2tog knit to end of round 34 sts row 1 ws p2 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of row knit 7 rounds row 2 rs k2 *p2 k2 repeat from * to end of row repeat rounds 7 and 8 32 sts row 3 ws repeat row 1 knit 8 rounds row 4 buttonhole row rs *k2 p1 p2tog yo k1 p2 k2 p2 k2tog yo p2 k2 ** p2 k1 k2tog yo p1 k2 p2 k2 repeat rounds 7 and 8 30 sts p2tog yo k2 p2 repeat from * to ** knit 8 rounds row 5-7 repeat row 1 to 3 repeat rounds 7 and 8 28 sts using larger size needles cast-off in pattern knit 1 round pick up 54 sts or mulltiple of 4 + 2 evenly along the lh edge with cc knit 1 round row 1 ws p2 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of row cuff row 2 rs k2 *p2 k2 repeat from * to end of row switch to smaller size small
